data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Bournemouth get the game underway.
Dominic Solanke puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 13, It's now 2-0 in Bournemouth as Dominic Solanke scores for Bournemouth.
David Brooks (Bournemouth) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! Bournemouth extend their lead to 3-0 through David Brooks.
In the minute 38, Harry Toffolo for Huddersfield has been booked by Oliver Langford and receives a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Oliver Langford blows to start the second-half. Huddersfield with the kick-off.
In the minute 53, Brahima Diarra is on a sub for Jaden Brown for Huddersfield.
The away team replace Danny Ward with Isaac Mbenza.
Dan Gosling is replacing David Brooks for Bournemouth at Vitality Stadium.
In the minute 62, Jason Tindall is making the team's second substitution at Vitality Stadium with Sam Surridge replacing Philip Billing.
Bournemouth take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Junior Stanislas.
Great finish from Sam Surridge to give Bournemouth a 5-0 lead.
In the minute 70, Bournemouth make their third substitution with Rodrigo Riquelme replacing Dominic Solanke.
The away team have replaced Lewis O'Brien with Alex Vallejo. This is the third substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a fourth substitution, with Romoney Crichlow-Noble replacing Harry Toffolo.
In the minute 86, Ajani Burchall is replacing Junior Stanislas for the home team.
The home team have replaced Adam Smith with Jordan Zemura. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jason Tindall.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 5-0.
